sections.title: Items
sections.content:
Items

 ItemWithVisibility ::=
 VisibilityModifier? (
 ConstantDeclaration
 | EnumDeclaration
 | ExternalBlock
 | ExternalCrateImport
 | FunctionDeclaration
 | Implementation
 | ModuleDeclaration
 | StaticDeclaration
 | StructDeclaration
 | TraitDeclaration
 | TypeAliasDeclaration
 | UnionDeclaration
 | UseImport
 )

 MacroItem ::=
 MacroRulesDeclaration
 | TerminatedMacroInvocation

 ItemSafety ::=
 $$unsafe$$
 | $$safe$$

The macro expansion of a terminated macro invocation is treated as
zero or more [item]s if the terminated macro invocation appears as
an item.

Elaboration is the process by which a declaration achieves its runtime
effects.

paragraphs.fls_s3b1cba9lfj5: The macro expansion of a terminated macro invocation is treated as zero or more [item]s if the terminated macro invocation appears as an item.

paragraphs.fls_hil5f7y4xdhe: Elaboration is the process by which a declaration achieves its runtime effects.

paragraphs.syntax_1:
Item ::=
       OuterAttributeOrDoc* (ItemWithVisibility | MacroItem)

   ItemWithVisibility ::=
       VisibilityModifier? (
           ConstantDeclaration
         | EnumDeclaration
         | ExternalBlock
         | ExternalCrateImport
         | FunctionDeclaration
         | Implementation
         | ModuleDeclaration
         | StaticDeclaration
         | StructDeclaration
         | TraitDeclaration
         | TypeAliasDeclaration
         | UnionDeclaration
         | UseImport
       ...
